text: Dario Penne (Born 1938 in Trieste, Dead 2023 in Rome) was an italian actor and voice actor. He is known as the italian voice of actors Anthony Hopkins, Tommy Lee Jones and John Lithgow. He also was the voice of Doctor Eggman in Sonic X. Category:People from Trieste Category:Italian actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:1938 births Category:2023 deaths
title: Dario Penne
